full_summary:
**Tender Announcement**
======================

**Reference Number** | **cb-669-99165313**
-------------------|---------------------

**Request for Proposal**
-----------------------

**Title** (English) | **Title** (French)  | 
---------------------|-----------------| 
Aircraft probes or sensors | Sondes ou capteurs pour avions |


**Contracting Entity**
----------------------

|  **Entity Name (English)** | **Entity Address** | 
|-------------------------------|---------------------------|
|  Transport Canada | 200 Comet Private, Ottawa, Ontario K1V 7B2, Canada |


**Project Overview**
---------------------

The Government of Canada, represented by Transport Canada, invites qualified suppliers to submit a proposal for a Supply Arrangement T8493-140035 Series for the procurement of aircraft probes or sensors.


**Key Project Details**
-----------------------

|  **Project Phase** | **Timeline** | 
|---------------------|--------------|
|  Request for Proposal | Closed |
|  Tender Closing Date  | 2024-05-04T00:00:00 | 

**The Tender**
----------------

A Request for Proposal (RFP) was issued to qualified bidders to provide aircraft probes or sensors for Transport Canada, Air Services Directorate. Invited bidders include:

- Bell Textron Canada
- Alpine Aerotech
- Helitrades inc.
- Skyline helicopters
- Bristow Instruments
- Casp Aerospace
- Icarus Aero
- Eagle Copters
- Genaire Ltd.
- Mid Canada Mod
- Mill Sterling
- Tronosjet
- Canada West Avionics
- Aerotech Company
- Arnprior Aerospace
- Aero Supplies
- Execaire
- JHT Defense
- Kadex Aero
- National Helicopters
- New Castle Aviation
- Optima-Aero
- Sea Aerospace
- Maxcraft Avionics
- Precision Heliparts Canada ULC

**Contracting Officer**
-----------------------

|  **Name** |  **Email** |  **Phone** | 
|  --------|  ----------|  ---------|
|  Yula Zourdos | yula.zourdos@tc.gc.ca | (343) 596-4353 |


**Notice**
----------

A corresponding Notice will be posted on the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) at least once a year to allow more suppliers to become qualified for the Supply Arrangement T8493-140035 Series.
